title: Stock Demand Forecast
subtitle: AI-powered insights to help you plan ahead for the next three months
chartLabel: Predicted Demand for the Next Three Months
restockAdvice: To avoid shortages, consider restocking {{count}} units as per AI demand predictions.
restockAdviceOverstocked: Great job! Your stock is sufficient, no need to restock right now
teaserTitle: Want to see future stock demand?
teaserText: Upgrade to Premium for AI predictions!
notEnoughData: Not enough sales data to generate a forecast.
upgradeRequired: Upgrade plan to access this feature
forbidden: You do not have permission to view this forecast.
productNotFoundOrNotYours: Product not found or you don't own it.
genericError: Something went wrong. Please try again.

notEnough.zeroText: To make accurate AI predictions, we need at least 10 days with sales. You currently have 0.
notEnough.almostText: To make accurate AI predictions, we need at least 10 days with sales. You have sales on {{count}} days. Just a few more and the forecast appears!
notEnough.tip: Make sure your store is open and the product is published to be visible!
